title: Contact system upgraded
body: The contact form now submits directly from the website via secure API handling, including request types for general enquiries, project work, and TestFlight access.

title: Legal footer information published
body: Company registration details and registered office information are now present across public pages to improve clarity and disclosure compliance.

title: VOW currently in active pre-release
body: VOW is currently in active pre-release with private beta preparation underway. The app page now includes blurred preview screens, updated product messaging, and app-specific legal links for submission readiness.
